title: GWU ASME Section
text:
Warning



The slide decks do render on mobile devices with iOS. Use a laptop or a desktop to view the content.

title: GWU ASME Section
text:
Goal of the lecture

Expose the students to the history and current state of IoT technology
Make the students realize that they are either wearing, holding or carrying an IoT device
Demo: Provide a working IoT application using the Raspberry Pi and the senseHat module
Case discussion: How Dominoâ€™s Pizza reinvented their pizza story using IoT
